scripts.create_deployer: ./soroban config identity generate alice && ./soroban config identity fund alice --network futurenet
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:hello && npm run deploy:incrementor
scripts.setup: ./soroban contract build && if [ ! -d .soroban ]; then npm run create_deployer && npm run deploy; fi
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run setup
scripts.postinstall: if [ ! -d .soroban ]; then npm run setup; fi && npm run bindings:hello && npm run bindings:incrementor
